tasks: Compress normal sequences using deterministic pushdown automata
results: Solves a question left open in a previous paper by V. Becher, P. A. Heiber and the first author
title: Deterministic pushdown automata can compress some normal sequences
abstract: In this paper, we give a deterministic pushdown transducer and a normal sequence of digits compressed by it. This solves positively a question left open in a previous paper by V. Becher, P. A. Heiber and the first author.
